extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the installed GitLab version is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the current version number.

extracted_playbook.title: Update GitLab to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) to the latest versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: GitLab Community Edition (CE) versions prior to 14.6.2, 14.5.3, and 14.4.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE) versions prior to 14.6.2, 14.5.3, and 14.4.5
